ModMetaData.name: Agrivoltaic Solar Panel
ModMetaData.author: Mlie
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/WAEzk68.png[/img]
This type of solar panel is possible to place over crops. The cost is a bit higher as they need to be placed on poles high over the crops. They are also a bit larger to represent the extra space they need to be able to share the solar energy.
They have 1x1 size but are drawn as 5x5 in transparent style to signify their height and to be able to see the crops below.
For more info see the [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Agrivoltaic]Wiki[/url] on how it works but basically plants and panels share the same area.
Idea and graphic by HydromancerX
[table] [tr] [td][url=https://invite.gg/Mlie][img]https://i.imgur.com/zdzzBrc.png[/img][/url][/td] [td][url=https://github.com/emipa606/AgrivoltaicSolarPanel][img]https://i.imgur.com/kTkpTOE.png[/img][/url][/td] [/tr] [/table]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/Rs6T6cr.png[/img] [list] [*] See if the the error persists if you just have this mod and its requirements active. [*] If not, try adding your other mods until it happens again. [*] Post your error-log using [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=818773962]HugsLib[/url] and command Ctrl+F12 [*] For best support, please use the Discord-channel for error-reporting. [*] Do not report errors by making a discussion-thread, I get no notification of that. [*] If you have the solution for a problem, please post it to the GitHub repository. [/list]
